DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess the safety, pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics and efficacy of repeated once daily oral administration of D961H 10 mg and D961H 20 mg in Japanese paediatric patients aged 1 to 14 years old who either have a diagnosis of or are suspected to have gastric ulcer (GU), duodenal ulcer (DU), anastomotic ulcer (AU), non-erosive reflux esophagitis disease (NERD), reflux esophagitis (RE) or Zollinger-Ellison syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/III Study of D961H 10 mg and 20 mg in Japanese Paediatric Patients With Gastrointestinal Acid Related Diseases
